tossup_question: -   –  Identify the fog that forms as warm moist air passes over a cooler surface?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W)Adiabatic fog
X)Radiation fog
Y)Frontal fog
Z)Advection fog
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following processes created the volcano Mount Nyiragongo [nee-ira-gong-oh] in the Democratic Republic of Congo?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W)Subduction
X)Hot spot
Y)Sea floor spreading
Z)Continental rifting
